ds.smartlink.rules.v1: Added referrer support, debug flag, and $comment with mova_spec_version 4.1.1.
env.smartlink.default.v1: Updated mova_version to 4.1.1, added decision/debug outputs.
Explicit references to rules/global/meta and text channel smartlink.redirected.
global.smartlink.v1: Reduced to roles/resources/text_channels actually required by rules/env.
Added text_channels smartlink.redirected with key fields.
meta.smartlink.v1: Package description aligned to MOVA 4.1.1 with references to candidate artifacts.
Explicitly fixed scope (four JSON files) and out-of-scope items (worker/infra).

ext.notes_from_operator: WF_EX_010 plan applied to the four candidate JSON artifacts. Any worker/deploy steps were out of scope and were not executed.
